tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE Waste_Records (
  record_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  method_id INT REFERENCES Waste_Disposal_Methods(method_id),
  date_recorded DATE,
  waste_type VARCHAR(20),
  weight_kg DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE CarbonFootprintData ( 
  data_id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
  waste_id INT REFERENCES WasteTypes(waste_id), 
  option_id INT REFERENCES WasteDisposalOptions(option_id), 
  carbon_emission FLOAT NOT NULL, 
  date_recorded DATE 
);
